Author: digitalminty
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] CIRCLE (CRC) ICO Schedule ðŸš€ Eco-system for Wealth Generation
Body: Hi Circlenet.io,  Nice presentation. We could possibly use a little bit more meat .  How does the platform plan on doing its trading? Is it a team of traders that will be performing these manually? What areas of trading will Circlenet be focusing on? (This is a bit critical for the lending business case).  Do you have wireframes or prototypes of the CRChat app, that has been presented?  And do you have any images of the exchange and lending platform? What will it be coded in?

Author: circlenet.io
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] CIRCLE (CRC) ICO Schedule ðŸš€ Eco-system for Wealth Generation
Body: Thank you,  For trading, up to now we do it manually and not using AI Platform / trading bot, etc (as others have said). we follow and analyze new tokens / coins that we consider prospects and make investments, all trading we do in Currency BTC (VS) new Coins. Why? last year we had profits doubled with significant BTC movement, and we believe this year we will experience again with CIRCLE.  CRCHAT is still in development, its original idea by using WebCryptoAPI and Firebase. Messages are end-to-end encrypted between the users. Furthermore, messages are destroyed on the server as soon as they reach their destination. The app is based on the Firebase Friendly Chat starter project.  Exchange and lending screen: http://image.ibb.co/g6xVMm/xcircle_lending.png

Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] CIRCLE (CRC) ICO Schedule ðŸš€ Eco-system for Wealth Generation

Author: circlenet.io
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] CIRCLE (CRC) ICO Schedule ðŸš€ Eco-system for Wealth Generation
Body: Hello FutureICOs,  We ourselves feel worried when starting this project, because see many failures that happened. but we decided to stay ahead, because we learned from the mistakes of other projects. We are not merely throwing nonsense, but we are trying to develop ideas into something that can be used and enjoyed by many people, starting from us then the CIRCLE community and continuing to be accepted by people all over the world.  for Lending ... we currently only share our methods, last year we had predicted that bitcoin prices would decline after a sharp rise. and will start the CIRCLE project at that time. and therefore we only choose to accept BTC. Last year we gained multiple benefits for investing in promising cryptocurrency and coupled with a BTC increment. we hope this year we can repeat it and experience it again with you in CIRCLE

Author: Rightchoice
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] CIRCLE (CRC) ICO Schedule ðŸš€ Eco-system for Wealth Generation
Body: CIRCLE (CRC) ICO Schedule Announced, to Offer Unique Re-investment and Referral Eco-system for Wealth Generation   The Pre-sale will begin on 21st January 2018 and last up to February 18 2018. Circle (CRC) has a total supply of 21 million, of which 8.4 million will be made available during the public sale.   The minimum purchase quantity is 50 CRC per single purchase, with a maximum cap of 5,000 tokens in a day. Early investors stand to make greater gains as the crowd sale will be held in the presale followed by four crowd sale stages of seven days each, with increase in price from $0.75 to $1.75.  Circle (CRC) is based on the Ethereum smart contract (ERC20) blockchain, and the distribution of coins will be as follows: Presale (10%), Crowd sale (30%), Development (55%), and Team (5%). The token can be bought by creating an account on the CIRCLE website.     Investors in Circle (CRC) will receive several lending and trading advantages that are not available with other crypto-currencies. During the ICO duration, the token offers lending services with capital return in 60 days. All interest and capital can be easily re-invested into the lending platform to gain more profit. The re-investment returns can be up to 1.6% daily.  Those who are unable to buy CRC can join a special affiliate program and earn commissions by introducing new investors. The CRC referral network can be spread as wide as possible, generating 10% income from F1 and F2 deposits together. Circle (CRC) is also protected against taxes and inflation, with sales tax not added to any purchase. The platform can be accessed from anywhere using its exclusive mobile app for Android and iOS, offering a coin wallet, and services such as deposits, transfer and lending.   Circle (CRC) is a golden opportunity tap into the new fountain of wealth that crypto-currencies are creating each day, enabling wealth to run freely and create a better and brighter future.  For more information, please check:  Official Website -  https://www.circlenet.io/  Whitepaper -  https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/e/2PACX-1vStvrTuBEOojklvIyX-bL_hGh2YAZRLrTxxIWZJ8vbM9TvxqV7xdZPOv7kGDv7_eMNE_kkG2oIiVBJo/pub?start=true&loop=true&delayms=3000&slide=id.g2d13cb9866_0_171  Social Media Links -  - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/circlenet.io/ - Medium: https://medium.com/@a.ritter8650/circle-ico-62788c9289a1 - Github: https://github.com/circlenetio - Telegram: https://t.me/circlenet
